section1.Name: Bill Hsu
section1.Item1: Over five years of experience in full-stack website development:
section1.ItemDetail1: Experienced in database planning, front-end and back-end architecture, and system operation flow.
section1.ItemDetail2: Skilled in integrating client requirements and proposing solutions through effective communication.
section1.Item3: Proficient in project management and agile development:
section1.ItemDetail3: Familiar with Scrum methodologies and proficient in using Teamwork for project management and progress tracking.
section1.ItemDetail4: Actively explores new industry knowledge, embraces new technologies, and assesses their feasibility for current projects.
section1.About_1: I am a software engineer with around 5 years of experience in both frontend and backend development, and capable of independently completing projects from both ends. My primary experience lies in developing IoT data integration systems, and I excel in information gathering and integration, as well as visualizing data according to client needs.
section1.About_2: On the frontend, I mainly use Vue.js with UI frameworks to build websites, and on the backend, I primarily use C# to develop APIs or services in the .NET ecosystem. Additionally, I am also familiar with Redis and Websockets.

section2.Title: Experience
section2.Content_1: Plan system architecture, including frontend and backend data integration, and database backup.
section2.Content_2: Collaborate with UI/UX designers to discuss system operation processes and how to improve user experience.
section2.Content_3: Write System Test Report and SOP operation documents.
section2.Content_4: Develop responsive web pages using Vue framework with Bootstrap to present user interfaces such as Dashboard and Runtime Monitor that meet customer needs.
section2.Content_5: Use i18n to support multiple languages on the website.
section2.Content_6: Use ECharts package to visualize data and present clear and understandable charts to display data status.
section2.Content_7: Use MSSQL Server to create a database and store data.
section2.Content_8: Use Entity Framework to integrate the database, perform data processing, and provide API interfaces.
section2.Content_9: Use Redis to integrate and apply Sensor data from IoT devices and store it in the database.

section4.Title: Education
section4.Subtitle_2: Department fo Digital Content and Technology
